targets.query: SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "ubunmonit.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "ubunmonit.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "ubunmonit.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "ubunmonit.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "ubunmonit.processcount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "ubunmonit.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "ubunmonit.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "ubunmonit.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "ubunmonit.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "ubunmonit.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "ubunmonit.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "ubunmonit.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("sda2.read_bytes")/mean("sda2.time_since_update")*8 FROM "ubunmonit.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sda2.write_bytes")/mean("sda2.time_since_update")*8 FROM "ubunmonit.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "ubunmonit.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("/boot/efi.percent") FROM "ubunmonit.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
